alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 04 at 3:07PM MDT until April 05 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches valley floor, locally up to 10 inches benches and areas impacted by lake effect snow. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Northern Wasatch Front, Salt Lake Valley and Utah Valley. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected, particularly overnight into Wednesday morning. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
